name: Pangaea (ARTnGAME)
description:
Pangaea is a Land and Water flows generator for Unity game engine.

The system is in development and will soon be in Beta phase for users of my other assets Sky Master ULTIMATE, Ethereal and InfiniGRASS (http://u3d.as/713).

This is a first WIP demo showcasing the various tools the run time terrain editing possibilities. All tools are also directly applicable in Unity editor.

More information on the system

www.artengame.com
